title: Transfer Talk podcast discuss Ross Barkley's move to Chelsea and Philippe Coutinho's Liverpool future
description: The third episode of Transfer Talk is available to download now!
content: Host Pete Graves was joined in the studio by Sky Sports News reporter Dharmesh Sheth and Spanish football expert Guillem Balague to discuss all the latest goings on in the world of transfers.The panel chat about Ross Barkley's £15m switch to Chelsea and discuss the reasons behind the England midfielder's move to Stamford Bridge.Click here to listen and subscribe via iTunes.They also delve into the future of Philippe Coutinho and provide an update on Barcelona's pursuit of the Liverpool midfielder.Turkish journalist Emre Sarigul joined the show to speak about new Everton forward Cenk Tosun following his £27m move to Goodison Park.The panel also analyse the transfer lines from a host of Premier League manager conferences, including Manchester City's Pep Guardiola and Arsenal's Arsene Wenger.Click here to listen to the Transfer Talk podcast.Sky Sports News reporter Keith Downie provides an update on the potential takeover of Newcastle and how that may affect manager Rafa Benitez in the market.If all that was not enough, Sky Sports News reporters Aidan Magee and Bryan Swanson joined the panel in the studio to answer all your questions!
